- Location: Ceiling HVAC vent/register in interior ceiling.
- Materials: Metal frame with plastic/metal louvers; textured drywall ceiling.
- Condition: Dust/dirt buildup on blades and interior; clean recommended.
- Structural note: Small vertical ceiling crack visible beneath vent; monitor for widening.
- Operation: Top damper/control area appears slightly loose/misaligned; verify secure mounting and airflow.
